import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit{ user: any[]; ngOnInit() { this.user = localStorage.getItem('user'); console.log(this.user) } }
